title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9650.4 - Hours and location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9650.4 - Hours and location

State Regulations
(a) The
executive director shall designate a location or locations where records shall
be available for public inspection and copying. (b) The authority shall accept requests for
public access to records and shall produce records during the authority's
regular business hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9650.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
